amendment.description: To provide that no changes in flood insurance status for any areas located in the St. Louis District of the Corps of Engineers can go into effect until the remapping process is completed for that entire District.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4715 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 24. Record Vote Number: 122.

action.text: Amendment SA 4715 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3951-3952, S3964-3965; text as modified: CR S3951) To provide that no changes in flood insurance status for any areas located in the St. Louis District of the Corps of Engineers can go into effect until the remapping process is completed for that entire District.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4715 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 24. Record Vote Number: 122.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4715 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 24. Record Vote Number: 122.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4715 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 4707.
